description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Responsibilities:
              
              - Promoting luxury timepieces to customers
              
              - Managing customer relationships through excellent sales service
              
              - Creating and maintaining customers network
              
              - Attending and helping in corporate and customers’ events and activities
              
              - Good team players who would participate in ensuring that the boutiques achieve its target, housekeeping and customer service standards.
              

              *Benefits:
              
              - Trained by international brand managers
              
              - Fixed salary (negotiation) plus commission
              
              - Training trips and/or attending events abroad
              

              * How to apply:
              
              - Interested applicants apply by sending in your updated resume before 6/8/2018 (in MS Word format) . Interview includes 3 rounds: with Operation Manager, test, with S&M Manager, with General Director.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduate with good records from leading universities (Foreign Trade University, Hanoi University, National Economics University...)
              
              - English IELTS: > 6.5
              
              - Fresh graduates with independence, self-motivation, self-learn skill, sales oriented with passion in retail industry are welcomed.
              
              - Able to work 5 – 5.5 days per week including weekends and public holidays (off days on rotation basis) and able to work retail hours.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
